recipesJson.name: Peachade
recipesJson.author: Jerseyjoe
recipesJson.description: MY ADV I fist was using just the Fa Lemon Sicily and FE Lemon. Then I saw Kindground Lemonade base he used the VT Lemon sour it helps it a lot.I did lower it a bit. Sometimes I use 2% juicy peach found 3% is better. Seems to be best steep 60mls at day 5-6. For the JF Honey Peach to blend in.
